entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
